page.title: 18MY DAY- IN SCHOOL
page.content: "Have a good day!" says Mum but I don't know why because I hardly ever do.Down the road, through the alley, round the corner.Put my coat and bags on the peg outside and wait for my friend. At 9.00 it's registration and then the Recorder groups have their lesson and practice "Captain Noah" for the concert. Next is Language, "On Target"-ugh, I hate it.Break at 10.30 and play "1,2,3 in".Now it's Project, I'm making a book about me! Lunch was sausages, chips and salad followed by iced sponge and more "1,2,3 in". It's near the concert so we have a whole class practice of "Capt. Noah" and that is followed by Games.Today my group have tennis with a teacher and a parent helping us. I hate tennis- I'm no good at it!Next week it should be Rounders.
